europeana:record.dc:title: Xyeloblacus gen. nov. (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Blacinae) parasitoid of Xyelinae (Xyelidae: Hymenoptera)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
Altenhofer E.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Hymenoptera; Braconidae; Blacinae; Xyeloblacus; Palaearctic; Austria; Poland; Japan; key
europeana:record.dc:description: The new genus Xyeloblacus (type species: Xyeloblacus leucobasis spec, nov.) is described and illustrated; it belongs to a new tribe (Xyeloblacini van Achterberg), and two Palaearctic species are included. The type species has been reared from two Xyela spp. ("Symphyta"; Xyelidae; Xyelinae) in Austria.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Xyeloblacus gen. nov. (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Blacinae) parasitoid of Xyelinae (Xyelidae: Hymenoptera) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 71) (Issue 25)
